title: JavaScript Basics
content: Learn the basics of JavaScript including variables, functions, arrays, objects, and loops. This is a gentle introduction for beginners.

title: Deep Dive into Functions
content: Understand function declarations, expressions, arrow functions, closures, and higher-order functions in JavaScript.

title: Node.js Guide
content: A comprehensive guide to Node.js backend development: modules, HTTP servers, Express, middleware, and routing.

title: MongoDB Tutorial
content: How to use MongoDB with Node.js for modern web apps. Covers CRUD operations, indexes, aggregation, and schema design.

title: Asynchronous JavaScript
content: Promises, async/await, event loop, microtasks, and practical patterns for handling asynchronous operations.

title: Express.js in Practice
content: Learn Express.js by building APIs, handling requests, validating input, and structuring projects.

title: Frontend Performance
content: Tips and techniques for optimizing web performance: bundling, code splitting, caching, and critical rendering path.

title: CSS Layouts
content: Master modern CSS layouts with Flexbox and Grid, responsive design strategies, and best practices.

title: TypeScript for JS Devs
content: Add types to your JavaScript with TypeScript. Learn interfaces, generics, unions, and configuration.

title: REST vs GraphQL
content: Compare REST and GraphQL APIs, schema design, resolvers, and performance considerations.
